title: Kaathal Kasakuthaiya Lyrics Aanpaavam
stanzas:
<div>
Kaathal Kasakuthaiya Lyrics Aanpaavam

Kadhal kasakkuthaiyaa
vara vara kaadhal
kasakkuthaiyaa

manamthaan loveu lovenu
adikkum
lovenu thudikkum
thoththupona kudikkum
paithiyam pudikkum.

Kadhal kasakkuthaiyaa
vara vara kaadhal
kasakkuthaiyaa

yaaraaro kadhalichu
yaaraaro kadhalichu
urupadala onnum saripadala
vazhkai endrum sugapadala

kadhala padam eduthaa
odumunga.
theatarile sanam
koodumunga.

devathaas avan paarvathi
ambigaapathi amaraavathi
kadhaiya kaelu mudiva paaru
kadaisiyil seraama vaazhaama
seththaanga enakindha

Kadhal kasakkuthaiyaa
vara vara kaadhal
kasakkuthaiyaa

manamthaan loveu lovenu
adikkum
lovenu thudikkum
thoththupona kudikkum
paithiyam pudikkum.

Kadhal kasakkuthaiyaa
vara vara kaadhal
kasakkuthaiyaa

eththanai cinemaa
eththanai drama paathaachu
eththanai duet
eththanai tune kaettaachu

eththanai paattu
iththanai kaettu ennaachu
buthiyum kettu
sakthiyum kettu
ninnaachu.

kittaapaa andha kaalathula
kaayaatha kaanagathe
PU  chinnappaa vandha kaalathula
kadhal kanirasame.
manmatha leelai
MKT kaalathula

nadaiyaa idhu nadaiyaa
namma nadigar thilagam
baaniyile

hello hello sugamaa
ada amaam neenga nalamaa
ingaeyum thaan kaettom
anna MGR pattukala

idhakaal ilaignar seiyyum
kadhalukku ilaiyaraja
endhan paattirukku

veettula adha paadunga
pondaatiya love pannunga
namma thagappan pechcha
thaayin pecha madhikkanum
neeyaaga pen thaeda koodaathu
enakindha

Kadhal kasakkuthaiyaa
vara vara kaadhal
kasakkuthaiyaa

manamthaan loveu lovenu
adikkum
lovenu thudikkum
thoththupona kudikkum
paithiyam pudikkum.
Kadhal ....
